item.title: Learning about the w command
item.description: The following tweet inspired me to dig deeper and write down my findings. ðŸ˜Œ It will also give you the uptime and load average numbers for the last 1, 5, and 15 minutes. That's what I'm using it for most of the time. — Mathias Lafeldt (@mlafeldt) September 22, 2020 I thought of using w as an alias. I can’t because it is a command. The command shows what users are currently logged in and what they are doing.
